content.rendered:
Digital Progressive Lenses for Optimum Vision Clarity

Maxus takes the level of basic digital freeform progressive lenses even higher with significantly improved vision clarity, sharpness and comfort in all vision zones. If you need wider fields of near and far vision and less of intermediate, then these new digital era freeform progressives are absolutely for you.

Features



  • Optimised digital progressive lenses
  • Wider near and better far vision
  • Low astigmatism provides visual comfort
  • Greater vision clarity
  • Offers wider fields of view
  • No swim effect
  • Easy adaption and comfort of use
  • Performance optimised

Ratings




Ask for Yash O&L Authenticity Card for your lenses

Lens Design
